name: Heavy Metal: F.A.K.K.2
description:
Heavy Metal: F.A.K.K.2 is an action-shooter game developed by Ritual Entertainment. It came out on 04-08-2000. Gathering of Developers published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Heavy Metal: F.A.K.K.2 has a score of 78. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Heavy Metal: F.A.K.K.2 on macOS, Linux and PC.
It was produced by Harry A. Miller IV. It was directed by Henry Selick. It was scored by Zak Belica.
